mapper.select: select * from LODGMENT_STORAGE where seller_no=#{sellerNo} and lodgment_delete=1
select * from HOTEL_XLSX where X_LODGMENT_NAME like '%'||#{searchInfo}||'%' or X_LODGMENT_ADDR like '%'||#{searchInfo}||'%'
select * from lodgment_storage where lodgment_no = #{lodgmentNo} and lodgment_delete=1
mapper.update: update lodgment_storage set lodgment_name=#{lodgmentName}, lodgment_addr=#{lodgmentAddr}, lodgment_img_path=#{lodgmentImgPath}, lodgment_notice=#{lodgmentNotice}, lodgment_check_in=#{lodgmentCheckIn}, lodgment_check_out=#{lodgmentCheckOut} where lodgment_no=#{lodgmentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_no AS room_no, r.lodgment_no AS lodgment_no, r.room_name AS room_name, r.room_qua AS room_qua, r.room_max_capacity AS room_max_capacity, r.room_price AS room_price, r.room_info AS room_info, rf.room_file_no AS room_file_no, rf.room_img AS room_img FROM room r LEFT JOIN room_file rf ON r.room_no = rf.room_no WHERE r.lodgment_no = #{lodgmentNo} and room_delete=1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select review_no, member_no, book_no, rating, lodgment_no, review_content, seller_comment, review_file_no, review_img_path, member_id from LODGMENT_REVIEW lr left join LODGMENT_REVIEW_FILE lrf using(REVIEW_NO) left join member using(member_no) where LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo} order by REVIEW_NO desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, b.* FROM ( SELECT rq.ROOM_QNA_NO, rq.LODGMENT_NO, rq.MEMBER_NO, rq.SC_QNA_STATUS, rq.QNA_CONTENT, rq.QNA_DATE, m.member_id FROM room_qna rq LEFT JOIN member m ON rq.member_no = m.member_no where lodgment_no=#{lodgmentNo} ORDER BY rq.room_qna_no DESC ) b ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ) rq LEFT JOIN qna_comment qc ON rq.ROOM_QNA_NO = qc.room_qna_no order by qc.QNA_COMMENT_NO desc
SELECT * FROM QNA_COMMENT qc LEFT JOIN room_qna rq ON rq.room_qna_no = qc.room_qna_no WHERE rq.lodgment_NO = #{lodgmentNo}

SELECT r.room_no AS room_no, r.lodgment_no AS lodgment_no, r.room_name AS room_name, r.room_qua AS room_qua, r.room_max_capacity AS room_max_capacity, r.room_price AS room_price, r.room_info AS room_info, st.service_tag_no AS serviceTagNo, st.service_tag_type AS serviceTagType, rf.room_file_no AS room_file_no, rf.room_img AS room_img FROM room r LEFT JOIN room_file rf ON r.room_no = rf.room_no LEFT JOIN ROOM_SERVICE_TAG rst ON r.room_no = rst.room_no LEFT JOIN SERVICE_TAG st ON st.SERVICE_TAG_NO = rst.SERVICE_TAG_NO WHERE r.room_no = #{roomNo} and r.room_delete=1
mapper.insert:
insert into room values(room_seq.nextval, #{lodgmentNo},#{roomName},#{roomQua},#{roomMaxCapacity},#{roomPrice},#{roomInfo},1)
select max(room_no) from room
mapper.select:
select stm_num, seller_no, stm_price, to_char(stm_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as stm_date from stm_tbl where seller_no = #{sellerNo} and stm_state=1
and stm_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') + 1 - 1/86400
select i.inquiry_no, i.inquiry_title, i.INQUIRY_CONTENT, i.REG_DATE, ir.INQUIRY_REPLY_CONTENT from INQUIRY i left join INQUIRY_REPLY ir ON i.inquiry_no = ir.inquiry_no where seller_no=#{sellerNo}

select iq.INQUIRY_TITLE, iq.inquiry_content, iq.reg_date, iqf.filepath, iqr.inquiry_reply_content, iqr.reg_date as reply_reg_date from INQUIRY iq left join inquiry_file iqf using(INQUIRY_NO) left join inquiry_reply iqr using(INQUIRY_NO) where inquiry_no=#{inqNo}

select b.book_no, b.member_id, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.payment_date, b.status, r.room_name, ls.LODGMENT_NAME from booking b left join room r using(room_no) left join LODGMENT_STORAGE ls on ls.LODGMENT_NO = r.LODGMENT_NO where b.seller_no=#{sellerNo}

select b.guest_name, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.payment_date, b.guest_count, b.guest_phone, b.status, b.guest_request, ls.lodgment_name, r.room_name from booking b join room r using(room_no) left join lodgment_storage ls using(lodgment_no) where b.book_no=#{bookNo}
mapper.update: update room set room_delete=0 where LODGMENT_NO=#{lodgmentNo}
update LODGMENT_STORAGE set lodgment_delete=2 where LODGMENT_NO=#{lodgmentNo}
update room set room_delete=0 where room_no=#{roomNo}
update LODGMENT_REVIEW set seller_comment=#{sellerComment} where review_no=#{reviewNo}
update Lodgmet_review set seller_comment=null where review_no=#{reviewNo}
update room set room_name=#{roomName}, room_qua=#{roomQua}, ROOM_MAX_CAPACITY=#{roomMaxCapacity}, room_price=#{roomPrice}, room_info=#{roomInfo} where room_no = #{roomNo}
